content: completed successfully 4. Review the messages by using the VMFVIEW PUT2PROD command: ==> vmfview put2prod You are viewing ¬ST: messages from the LAST run. Number of messages shown = 4 <===> Number of messages not shown = 436 ************************************************************************ **** PUT2PROD SYSTEM: LEFT720 USERID: MAINT720 **** ************************************************************************ **** Date: 09/17/20 Time: 18:16:35 **** ************************************************************************ CK:VMFP2P1233I The following products have been put into production. CK: Recycle the appropriate servers. CK:VMFP2P1233I CMS CP TCPIP VMHCD CK:VMFP2P1239I CP was serviced. Shutdown and re-IPL the system to employ CK: the new service. CK:VMFP2P1239I CMS was serviced. Re-IPL CMS in all virtual machines CK: running CMS to employ the new service. In this example, the messages are informational. If warning or error messages exist, you must address those issues. 5.
